instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message:
Hello friends I have this computer that when connecting the usb c the fans rotate at full speed, but it does not turn on, check these voltages:
PPBUS_G3H 13.01

PPBUS_HS_CPU13.01

PPBUS_HS_OTH5V 13.01

PPBUS_HS_OTH3V3 13.01

PPBUS_S4_HS_TPAD 13.01

PPDCIN_G3H 20.23

PP3V3_G3H 3.4

PP3V3_G3H_SMC_ISNS 3.4

PP3V0_G3H

PP1V0_SUS 1.0

PP1V0_SUSSW

PP1V0_S3

PP1V0_S0SW 0.996

PPVCC_S0_CPU 1.0

PPVCCSA_S0_CPU 1.0

PPVCCGT_S0_CPU 0 / 3.1 ohms

PPVCCIO_S0_CPU 0.954

PPVCCPRIMCORE_SUS_PCH 1v

PP1V2_S3 1.2v

PP1V2_S3_CPUDDR 1.2

PP1V8_S4 1.8

PP1V8_S3 1.8

PP1V8_S3_MEM 1.8

PP1V8_S0 1.8

PP5V_S5 5.1

PP5V_S4 5.1

PP5V_S0_T139 5.1

PP5V_S4SW 0

PP5V_S4SW_ISNS 0

PP5V_S0 5.1

PP5V_S0_KBD 5.1

PP3V3_S5 3.3

PP3V3_SUS 3.3

PP3V3_S4 3.3

PP3V3_2V7_NAND_VCC 0.. 

PPVCCGT_S0_CPU line has 0v verify in diode mode and resistance with reference to ground
Diode: 0.007
Cpu is dead? 
Resistance: 3.0 ohm

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message:
"PP5V_S4SW 0"
Did you check for short?

No idea about other voltages where you posted names, without values!

Post U8213 voltages.

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message:
U8213 is not factory installed

Check voltage on the pads:
Pp5v_s4 5.1v
Smc_sensor_pwr_en: 3.3v
P5v_s4sw_sns_fet_ramp: It ranges from 1v to 600mv
Pp5v_s4sw: now It ranges from 1v to 600mv

PP1V0_S0SW 0.996

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message:
"U8213 is not factory installed"
Then PP5V_S4SW is not required.

Really no need to measure PPBUS in 5 points!

VCCGT only appears under high graphics load; no short there.

"PP3V3_2V7_NAND_VCC 0"
This is a problem.
Check diode mode to ground first.
If no short, post U9400 voltages; pins 19, 20, 15.

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message:
PP3V3_2V7_NAND_VCC: Diode mode 401
U9400; pins 19, 20, 15. Is 0v

threads.title: Macbook 820-000239 no power
threads.message: The metal plate of J9600 is in place?
